pr_title: Add Inspecting tables example by HDFS path in the Iceberg User docs

timeline.message:
Update spark.md

Add Inspecting tables example by HDFS path

timeline.bodyText:
Where does table come from? And why require loading MetadataTableType?
I think it would be better to use just a string, following the pattern of the other HDFS examples:
spark.read.format("iceberg").load("hdfs://nn:8020/warehouse/db.db/table#history").show(truncate = false)
timeline.author: rdblue
timeline.diffHunk:

